title: WTT High $ MJ/Lebron collection- For Graded T206 & other Vintage
author: Henryjrmarine

posts.post_title: WTT High $ MJ/Lebron collection- For Graded T206 & other Vintage
posts.post_content:
Wanting to trade an extremely large MJ collection, which is extremely hot right now, looking to trade for Graded T206, Old Judge, other Vintage, and the cards below.  Emails at bottom of the post, I'm willing to send first since I'm new to the site.

Some specific cards Im looking for:
-Most graded T206, 1887 Old Judge, 1915 Cracker Jack, 48' leaf, or other Pre-ww2 H.O.F. 
-Ty Cobb-  Pastel boys life, American Caramels, Misc. PRE-1930 Non-T206 Oddballs.
-Ruth-  33 goudey- Red & yellow backgrounds, 34 Goudey, 48 Leaf
-CY young- All T206's, American Caramel, Misc.
-48/49' leaf Jackie Robinson- yellow & red
-Mantle-  low grade 51 bowman, 52 topps
-Autos or Writing of Mantle, Jackie, Pete Maravich, Ruth, Cobb, CY.
-RC's of P.Rose, N. Ryan, Mays, Aaron, Wilt C., Mikan
-t206 Speaker, Crawford, W.Johnson, Mathewson, Nap

-email anything youre willing to trade for MJs/Lebrons/Kobes, to: [url]Henry@IndianaSteelServices.com[/url]
